name: WordHighlightToolbar-uc-js-White-Icons
description:
For the userChromeJS script URL https://github.com/Griever/userChromeJS/blob/master/WordHighlightToolbar/WordHighlightToolbar.uc.js
Lets you choose between black(default) or white iconsets of the highlight toolbox. 
Compatible with Aero/transparent styles.
Windows/Firefox 12+ tested.
